Aether.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Deal #yPiercing damage to ALL enemies.

Agility.DESCRIPTION: When you gain or lose #yAgility, gain or lose that much #yDexterity. Lose #b1 #yAgility at the start of each turn.

Blur.DESCRIPTION: Your #yBlock will not be removed at the start of your next turn.

Burning.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the start of your turn. Also take #b4% more #yAttack damage per stack. Reduced by 1 each turn.

Choked.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, the target loses 1 HP.

Constricted.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of each turn.

Cycle.DESCRIPTION: Discard a certain number of cards then draw that many cards.

Demon Form.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yStrength at the start of each turn.

Discover.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

Earth.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Gain temporary #yThorns while #yChanneled. It is automatically #yEvoked after 3 turns and deals damage randomly split amongst ALL enemies.

Enchanted Armor.DESCRIPTION: Take less damage from ALL Sources. Further stacks are less effective.

Envenom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b1 #yPoison per stack.

Fire.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Apply #yBurning and damage the highest health enemy.

Flame Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal #b1 damage back.

Flight.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less #yAttack damage. Lose 1 stack until end of turn when taking damage, the power is cancelled at 0 stacks.

Force.DESCRIPTION: When you gain or lose #yForce, gain or lose that much #yStrength. Lose #b1 #yForce at the start of each turn.

Intellect.DESCRIPTION: When you gain or lose #yIntellect, gain or lose that much #yFocus. Lose #b1 #yIntellect at the start of each turn.

Juggernaut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain #yBlock, deal damage to a random enemy.

Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per combat, across all copies of this card.

Malleable.DESCRIPTION: Upon receiving attack damage, gain #yBlock. #yBlock gain increases as this power is triggered. Resets at the start of your turn.

Metallicize.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the start of your turn.

Plated Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the end of your turn. Reduced by #b1 when receiving unblocked damage.

Rebound.DESCRIPTION: Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

Semi-Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per turn, across all copies of this card.

Steal.DESCRIPTION: You can steal up to #b50 #yGold from a boss, #b25 #yGold from an elite, or #b10 #yGold from other non-minion enemies.

Slow.DESCRIPTION: For every card you have played this turn, enemy takes #b10% more damage from #yAttacks.

Temporary HP.DESCRIPTION: Temporary HP disappears at the end of combat.

~Preview.DESCRIPTION: Press #pSHIFT to view related cards (outside combat).

~Unique.DESCRIPTION: Can be upgraded any number of times. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck, additional copies will #yUpgrade this card instead.
